p: Dehydroabietic hexyl acrylate is a solid. It can be synthesized from dehydroabietyl chloride, hexanediol and acryloyl chloride according to Scheme 12, and using separation methods such as filtration, precipitation, washing and vacuum drying [ 148]. Its application is a soft acrylic monomer (glass transition temperature of −23 °C), which can impart a flexibility to the integrated polymer [ 148].
